ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This class was a great introduction to using computational methods for questions in linguistics. Everyone should take this course.
It was a very valuable class and a good intro to a lot of topics.

The only course at Yale if you're interested in natural language processing. You should definitely take it! Highly recommended even for students in other fields since NLP will only become more important and ubiquitous in the future.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
